sentence.Network_en: Bolivia has been mercifully free of large-scale, drug-related violence.

sentence.Network_en: Bolivia returned to democratic rule in 1982, after a series of military governments.
sentence.Network_cn: 在经历了数届军人政府后，玻利维亚于1982年恢复了民主政权。

sentence.Network_en: Many customers crowded the local barber shop in the town of Cochabamba, Bolivia.
sentence.Network_cn: 很多顾客聚集在玻利维亚的科恰班马城的理发店里.
